Internal systems resolving legitimate ex.Action: Monitor Zeek dns.log for queries to critical external domains. Compare resolved IP addresses against expected values or whitelists. Identify deviations and perform correlation analysis between source IPs (internal clients), destination IPs (resolved external addresses), and query timestamps to find clusters of anomalous resolutions.

Detection of DNS queries/responses chara.Action: Analyze Zeek dns.log for anomalies in query structure (e.g., entropy calculation on query names for detecting DGA or unusually long subdomains). Filter DNS queries/responses to known suspicious IP addresses or patterns. Correlate suspicious DNS activity (Zeek dns.log) with follow-on connections (Zeek conn.log) to the resolved IPs using time series analysis to identify potential C2 sessions.
